messages.subject: Trains and John Henry
messages.msgSnippet: Logan is into trains, so I just read him a John Henry story (from a Disney book). I told him there are songs written about John Henry, so we re listening to
messages.messageBody:
Logan is into trains, so I just read him a John Henry story (from a Disney book). I told him there are songs written about John Henry, so we're listening to some now. Just listened to Johnny Cash, and now we're listening to Leslie Riddle.

Here's a link to songs if you're interested.

http://www.ibiblio.org/john_henry/songlist.html

Beth



Sing, Dance, Laugh...LOVE!

---------------------------------
